description:
For failing to learn from their continued losses, Peyket and Chigiru take Heybot and Nejiru on a training march to the God Screw. But what starts out as a routine pilgrimage to the extraterrestrial creator of all screws ends up as a trip through the factory where Heybots are made and tested... in other words, Hell!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heybot and Peyket`s Trip Through Hell
ヘボット, ペケット 地獄めぐり
